definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
doorstep/sill/threshold/fig. knack or trick (esp. scheme to get sth cheaper)
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married

sentences.english: The judge played bridge in the lodge with the budgeter last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚法官和预算员在门房里打过桥牌。

sentences.english: He didn't hit out, but hit the wicket by a fluke.
sentences.chinese: 他并未用力击球，却歪打正着击中了三柱门。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店员警告我说开门前最好先敲敲门，以便把它们吓跑。

sentences.english: Mist nudged up against the windows and doors of the house.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾遭遇房屋的窗口和门而用肘轻推。

sentences.english: I could hear the door banging in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到门被风吹得直响。

sentences.english: In tenth-century France, the doors of traitors and criminals were painted yellow.
sentences.chinese: 在十世纪的法国，叛徒和罪犯的门都被漆成黄色。

sentences.english: On one of many cold frosty nights, I shut my caravan door behind me and took a step out into the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 在一个寒冷的霜夜，我关上房车的门，慢慢步入黑暗。

sentences.english: He shouted and rapped with his walking stick on the door.
sentences.chinese: 他边喊着边用拐杖敲着门。

sentences.english: The rear door hinges/is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards.
sentences.chinese: 后面的门是在顶部铰接上的，以便可以向上开。

sentences.english: If it is referring to the Shinto shrine, then known as the Torii gate.
sentences.chinese: 如果是指神道教的神社的话，那个门叫做鸟居。

sentences.english: The design of crane rail beam.
Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs(eg. at a manway)in refractory linings.
sentences.chinese: 必须小心地完全封闭耐火材料衬里的进口门。

sentences.english: Door hinged on the left hand side, one-hand operation, lockable.
sentences.chinese: 门绞链在左面，单手操作，有门锁。

sentences.english: Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 本细则由国务院环境保护部门负责解释。

sentences.english: The kep overcomes the defect that the original door has low coefficient of a safety tool.
sentences.chinese: 克服了原有门安全工具系数小的缺点。

definition: to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
to close (a door)/to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
to fan/to slap sb on the face
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
